LanguageData.nokia3310a.label: nokia 3310
LanguageData.nokia3310a.description: Hardest, strongest and most reliable item known to man. It's secrets have been lost to ages. Most of the remaining samples have been long shipped to glittertech worlds to be researched.
LanguageData.nokia8450a.label: nokia 8450 Successor of legendary Nokia 3310, this highly insignificant model is still a highly sought after alternative for the less fortunate.
